modName: Big N Maru santoryu and Niten ichiryu katana
descriptionHtml:
Hi, guys, I was a member of [DLC Acalanatha/Fudou Myouou] organization. I am Nemon .
Uh ... because the boss's(YYK) request, I modified the [Fudou Myouou] this weapon, now share with you .
She is called the ... Big N Maru .
Of course, this is the original version : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53872/?

Introduction :
Big N Maru [santoryu/ Niten ichiryu]
Mei : Big N Maru [handachi toppei Koshirae ]
Jincho: 2-Shaku 5-sun 2-bu
Sori: 7-Bu
me ku gi a na: 1-Ko
ji: Itamehada
ha mo n: Ranba, kinsuji, Sunagare
Hi: Bohi ni no Re hi
ki sa ki: Okissaki
bo u shi : Kake sao
Fuku katana: Itokena Tsubame unokubi [katana], hata mon-ba [Ko Dachi]

Big N Maru【三刀流/二天一流】
銘：Big N Maru【半太刀突兵侟】
刃長：2尺5寸2分
反り：7分
目釘穴：1個
地鉄：板目肌
刃紋：乱刃、金筋、砂流
樋：棒樋に连れ樋
鋒：大切先
釯子：掛掃
副刀：稚燕鵜首【打刀】、旗紋場【小太刀】

How to get:
Steel Forging

Install：
Just use NMM to install this mod! or use launcher.

Uninstall：
Also use NMM to uninstall or use launcher.

Sorry, English is not my native language.
----------------------------------------------------------------
Added: where a secondary weapon has been shared.
katana/yoto hata mon-ba[[Ko Dachi] by YYK : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54172/?
I hope you will support, thank u. :)
author: Nemon
